ExploreFact.Text: Moon of Cludos, and undergoes extreme tidal forces, resulting in lava on the surface.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai spotted this moon whilst mining Dhar.

ExploreFact.Text: Two Nomai flew on the clan's first interplanetary spaceship to Rico. They found an extremely high abundance of metal, and discussed plans about a spaceport.
On Rico, they turned away from the horizon for 2 seconds. Upon looking back up, a large purple moon was orbiting Wher, along with Mhor and Dhar.
